duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for material forecast, planning and provisioning for internal/external customers based on service level agreements with consideration of budget planning parameters.
Ensure ERP SOR reflects material purchases and movement of assets while ensuring compliance with established internal control procedures.
Analyzing support material requirements and executing order fulfillment plans to ensure service level requirements are met at PTS service centers.
Track material movement within PTS network and address TAT exceptions.
Identify and resolve supply chain related problems to increase efficiency and productivity.
Produce and analyze material performance data to ensure material provisioning is current to service agreement obligations and recommend changes to management prior to execution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant field or minimum of 4 years' experience in Inventory Management, Order Fulfillment, Production Planning, Inventory Planning, Purchasing, or Business Process Analysis.
2 years knowledge and experience in logistics, transportation, and warehouse distribution.
